meanings.def: advertising material sent by email to people who have not asked for it
examples: I get thousands of spam emails each month.
Tougher laws and improved spam filters can help cut down on spam reaching your inbox.

meanings.def: cooked meat that has been cut up in very small pieces that are pressed together in a container, usually sold in cans and served cold in slices
to send the same message to large numbers of internet users who have not requested the information
examples: Some companies will keep spamming you until you change your email address.
Some idiot has been spamming my blog with comments.
